titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation, for a publick general fast, throughout the realm of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Edinburgh, the third day of May, 1665. And of Our Reign the seventeenth year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
